title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from a table are displayed in different formats in dynamic text items and data/text items.
EB: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in both dynamic text items and data/text items.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
  1. Insert new Date() as the content for three items.
  2. Save and preview the items.
  
Expected result:
- The dynamic text item and the data/text item should display the datetime values in the same format.
  
Actual result:
- The data and text item display the datetime in the same format, but the dynamic text item displays it differently.
